description_txt: stated on January 10, 2012 in a speech:

description_txt: stated on January 24, 2012 in the State of the Union address:

description_txt: stated on January 24, 2012 in the State of the Union address:

quote_txt: Rob Cornilles supports privatizing Medicare.

description_txt: stated on November 8, 2011 in a USA Today column.:
quote_txt: A typical married couple "will contribute $119,000" into Medicare but will "receive $357,000 in Medicare benefits over their lifetimes."

description_txt: stated on January 23, 2012 in a Republican presidential debate in Tampa:

description_txt: stated on January 9, 2012 in an opinion column:

description_txt: stated on January 17, 2012 in a press release:
